Placeholder WebAssembly + WebGPU simulation.

<div style="width: 100%; height: 400px; border: 1px solid #333; background: #000;">
    <canvas id="bevy-canvas" oncontextmenu="return false;"></canvas>
</div>

<script type="module">
    // Import the init function from the file generated by wasm-bindgen
    import init from '/wasm/spinning_cube.js';

    async function run() {
        try {
            console.log("Loading WASM simulation...");
            await init();
            console.log("WASM initialized successfully.");
        } catch (e) {
            console.error("Failed to load WASM simulation:", e);
            const canvas = document.getElementById("bevy-canvas");
            if (canvas) {
                canvas.style.border = "2px solid red";
                canvas.style.background = "red";
            }
        }
    }

    run();
</script>
